name: Achievements
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Tracks kill and death milestones for multiple NPC types, Displays progress bars and achievement list in a menu, Unlocks rewards when requirements are met, Notifies players upon unlocking an achievement, and Character data stores achievement progress.
features: Tracks kill and death milestones for multiple NPC types
Displays progress bars and achievement list in a menu
Unlocks rewards when requirements are met
Notifies players upon unlocking an achievement

name: Animations
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Adds various /act commands for roleplay animations, Commands trigger animations from the EGM pack, Animations can be interrupted with movement, Supports both casual and combat poses, and Showcases dancing and gesture options.
features: Adds various /act commands for roleplay animations
Commands trigger animations from the EGM pack
Animations can be interrupted with movement
Supports both casual and combat poses

Attachments modify weapon stats and appearance
Can disable if ArcCW is not present

name: Banking
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Players can open up to three bank accounts for fees, Deposit, withdraw and transfer funds between accounts, Item bank storage with size based on VIP status, Transaction logs stored per account, and Anti-spam timers for banking actions.
features: Players can open up to three bank accounts for fees
withdraw and transfer funds between accounts
Item bank storage with size based on VIP status

author: Samael

Handles gender specific models and bodygroups

name: Car Bomb
author: Samael

Bomb starts when engine is active and explodes after delay

name: Cassette Player
author: Samael
description: Provides features such as Adds portable cassette players, Cassettes are collectible items with music, Players insert tapes to play audio, Playback heard by nearby players, and Useful for ambience or RP events.

Players insert tapes to play audio
Useful for ambience or RP events

author: Samael

features: Players trigger Code 99 alerts with network message
Sends name and position to authorized jobs

Shows status on HUD for participants

author: Samael
